bs-privacy-prefs-cookieacceptmandatory-h: Daaneba seŋ ka ba sage a madetoore kɔɔkere a tõɔ nyɛ kyɛ meŋ pɔgerɔ a
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicymandatory-: Daaneba seŋ ka taa teɛroŋ ko a ''piravisi polisiri'' ane ''sɛɛvisi tɛɛmɛ '' a pɔge kyɛ nyɛre nyaamo
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicyonlogin-he: Sage a ''peravisi polisi'' aneŋ '' sɛɛvisi tɛɛme'' paale la a kpeɛbo. O boɔrɔ la kpeɛbo kyɛ saŋa zaa a daana leɛ-yi a teɛroŋ a sʋʋtere.
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicymandatory-: Enabol madatore ''peravisi polisi'' ane''sɛɛvisi mine tɛɛme''
bs-privacy-prefs-privacypolicyonlogin-la: Sage ''peravisi polisi'' ane ''sɛɛvisi mine tɛɛme'' naŋ be kpeɛbo.
